items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.
items.title: 2BAD/ts-lib-starter: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: Easily create a cookie consent modal and pass your own list of cookie preferences (to accept or refuse each one). The modal includes three buttons: accept, preferences, and refuse. it works with vanilla javascript + html + css, no dependencies are required and the module is built in a very lightweight size.
items.title: WebCimes/webcimes-cookies: Easily create a cookie consent modal and pass your own list of cookie preferences (to accept or refuse each one). The modal includes three buttons: accept, preferences, and refuse. it works with vanilla javascript + html + css, no dependencies are required and the module is built in a very lightweight size.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
items.title: owner888/kaliphp: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
